website_summaries.verdict: These jeans are attractive and comfortable at an affordable price, yet not the top value.
pros: Good-looking maternity jeans with comfortable fit
Soft, stretchable denim that wears well throughout the day
cons: Some size discrepancies have been reported
The belly panel may fit a bit loose in the early months of pregnancy

customer_reviews.title: Sooo comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these maternity jeans and wish I would have ordered sooner. I am 160 lbs, 6' height, and 6 months pregnant and size medium worked perfect for me. They are fitting but stretchy. I could have prob worn a small, but I didn't want them to be tight like that. I was completely shocked that the length worked for me too. Love love love! (Ignore mirror marks in the pics)
customer_reviews.author: S.J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for curvy tall girls!
customer_reviews.text: Love their maternity pants. These skinny jeans are my favorite!! Comfy and perfect fit. I'm currently 5'8" and 188lbs (22weeks prego) and ordered an XL. They are not too tight or baggy, they are not highwaters. Great jeans. For comparison, I have a pair of Motherhood maternity jeans in a Large that became highwaters and more tight in the hips/thighs than I like after washing/drying.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: True to size, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These jeans are FANTASTIC! I'm 10 weeks with my 4th, so I needed to break out the maternity pants pretty quickly. I wear a size 16/18 and bought the XXL---they fit really well. They're comfortable, albeit a little bit long. I'm 5'5" and they probably need 2-3" hemmed off. The full panel band is comfortable and seems like it will be durable throughout the pregnancy. MY ONLY COMPLAINT= When I bought these 3 weeks ago, they were $9.80 per pair (I bought 2), but today (3/14/18) they are $50. The jump to $50 per pair is absurd. They're a great pair of jeans, but there's no way I would pay $50 for them.
customer_reviews.author: jjjack

customer_reviews.title: Great fabric- the belly band is a little thicker material ...
customer_reviews.text: Great fabric- the belly band is a little thicker material than I’m used to, but it is a welcome surprise in Wisconsin winter. The length is a smidge long, but I won’t need to hem them! (I expected that I might have to because I am only 5’3”). The extra small I ordered feels like my average size 2 (comfortable tight fit - 120 pre-pregnancy). My only concern is that I won’t be able to wear them all the way to 9 months... but I’m due in July, so I will have stopped wearing jeans way before then.
customer_reviews.author: AndyLiz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: These jeans are wonderful! I'm 5'4, 5 months pregnant, and weigh 152 lb. I ordered a size medium and they fit so comfortably! The band around the belly gives good support but, I can tell it will stretch to accommodate growth over the rest of my pregnancy. They look very nice and have some stretch throughout the legs as well. I just don't think you can find better quality maternity jeans for this price. I have a feeling I will be purchasing more of these pants in the very near future!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are great, I bought these when I was about 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: They are great, I bought these when I was about 4 month pregnant, and they fit me all the way. The fabric is good quality and they look really nice. I was size 10 or medium before the pregnancy and that's the size I bought. They are a a little expensive maybe, I saw cheaper at target, but I don't know if those will work as good as these ones.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great
customer_reviews.text: Too big in the hips, but the legs are good. The sturdy tan elastic panel does stretch out with wear, which means I'm constantly pulling them up. Hoping this gets better as the belly gets bigger, but I'm not very optimistic. I do wish the denim portion had a higher rise in the back since the tan tends to grip shirts and make them ride up. The wash is nice, I can line dry them without them staying baggy (a concern after they stretch with wear and I don't like to use my dryer in the summer).
customer_reviews.author: Arpie

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these before my bump was really big, ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these before my bump was really big, but I was starting to outgrow my regular jeans. They fit well and Iike having a nude panel (as opposed to dark blue in most maternity jeans) because it doesn't show up when wearing a white shirt. My only complaint is they aren't a true skinny jean. I also found them too long for my 5'2" frame, and have to roll them up.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Nice long leg, great fit (PSA not true skinny jeans, they're even better)
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for postpartum. I purchased in my regular pre-pregnancy size Medium (8-10) and they fit great. I'm 5'9 155lbs pre-pregnancy and gained about 28lbs (to give you an idea). Nice amount of stretch, thick denim--they feel more expensive than they are. And although they aren't true skinny jeans, they look really great---the style is somewhere between skinny and a true straight leg. These are especially awesome if you have long legs and struggle to find pants that go past your ankle!
customer_reviews.author: Trish P.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: These jeans are awesome! They hug you in just the right amount while still having enough stretch to be very comfortable. I have been having trouble finding flattering pregnancy pants and these are it for a great price! I’m 5’9, 185lbs, 27weeks pregnant. I ordered the large first, but ended up liking the fit of the Medium better! Which is nice because in other brands I’m L/10. My prepreg size was a 4/6, M in most pants. The length is great for me; right to the top of my foot/bottom of my ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Suvak Warden

customer_reviews.title: Pants fit true to size. 3 stars because the ...
customer_reviews.text: Pants fit true to size. 3 stars because the elastic band for the belly is way to thick and constricting. I already washed mine so I can’t return them but I wore them for 1 day and couldn’t wait to get out of them. It’s a double layer belly band made of thick material with only moderate stretch. I will be altering these myself since I can’t return.
customer_reviews.author: Ann K

customer_reviews.title: Maybe you get your order, maybe you don't
customer_reviews.text: These jeans are super comfy and I love them. The company is a bit flaky though. I ordered these jeans and they came right away, but another pair that I ordered on the same day probably won't come until April (almost 2 months after I first ordered them). It is a little frustrating because these are maternity jeans -- so they only have a limited window of usefulness. For a maternity company you would think that they would be a little bit more punctual.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Jakulewicz

customer_reviews.title: I ordered an XS afraid they would not fit but they are perfect! They fit like a skinny jean on my ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so they aren't the most flattering on my bum, but that's a tricky task anyway. I was wearing a size 4 before gaining 12+ lbs in my 1st trimester; I ordered an XS afraid they would not fit but they are perfect! They fit like a skinny jean on my legs and thighs (I was athletic/curvy). They may or may not make it to the 3rd trimester, but I don't care. I feel feminine and comfy again! Ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: dreamergal

customer_reviews.title: They're nice and stretchy so they're really comfy but hold their ...
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but I'm just so excited about these pants! I have tried every other maternity brand out there and these just trump them all. They're nice and stretchy so they're really comfy but hold their shape well! Normally 140 pounds but 165 pounds now that I'm pregnant and the medium fits perfect- a little long but nothing to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Love. These
customer_reviews.text: I. Love. These. I have three pairs of maternity pants and mourn the loss of these every time I have to wash them. The belly band retains its stretch, throughout multiple wearings, and they’re really comfortable. The length is great. I knocked off a star because I purchased them for less than half the price as what they are selling for now. It seems that amazon included these in their new clothing subscription box, which really affected the price, unfortunately. I went to buy another pair, three weeks after my initial purchase and found that the price had more than doubled. Really disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and length!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 17 weeks along and have tried on several pairs of maternity jeans in the store with no success... these came today and are AMAZING. Fit wonderfully and a great length for tall-ish gals (I’m 5’8 and pre-pregnancy size 8, 145lbs). With your shirt pulled down past the over-bump part, these look like really cute, regular jeans! Excited to wear these as my bump continues to grow
customer_reviews.author: Kj

customer_reviews.title: They don't sag!
customer_reviews.text: Most maternity jeans I put on and immediately find myself hoisting them right back up because they sag, especially when I bend or lean down for something. These don't sag! I bought these for a work trip and ended up wearing them 5 out of 6 days without washing them because they stayed up so well and didn't stretch out like other maternity jeans. It's also very refreshing to have pockets on maternity jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Johnsen

customer_reviews.title: I love this pants
customer_reviews.text: I love this pants.. just got them yesterday. This is my second pregnancy and last time I just got motherhood maternity and pea in the pod.. I am xsmall petitie in those brands got the xs and even though is a little long it fits perfect I'm typically weight 116 pounds pre pregnancy and typically wear size 4 petite. Haven't wash them yet I hope they hold up good
customer_reviews.author: Molial

customer_reviews.title: I really like these pants
customer_reviews.text: I really like these pants. The color is nice (wash them first or else you'll get everything blue) and the style is perfect for me. The only issue I had was the fabric that goes over the belly stretched out within 30 minutes of wearing them and I was constantly yanking them up. Even when I was at the end of my pregnancy. That's not cool. But other than that, they are really nice jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Pants Delivered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the three seasons skinny jeans and received the three seasons boot cut, which were very unattractive on me. I am a good bit taller than the average female, making it difficult to find jeans that fit when I am not pregnant. The skinny jeans would have at least been wearable even if they were a bit short, but I could not have gone out in public with these high waters. For reference, I am 5' 10" and weigh 142 pre-pregnancy. There seems to be a lack of attention when packaging items, which was very disappointing. I don't want to have to go through the process of ordering again just to receive the wrong item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The jeans are awesome and I really like how they fit
customer_reviews.text: The jeans are awesome and I really like how they fit. The elastic band is pretty tight though. On one hand, they definitely stay up, on the other, the elastic is so snug that it starts to make me feel nauseous after wearing them for a few hours (of the joys of pregnancy). I fear the elastic will be way too tight when my belly gets really big, but I'd rather not go up a size because the actual jean part fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Kiersten

customer_reviews.title: but I have had a hard time finding good maternity jeans and these will be just great
customer_reviews.text: These pants are not as form fitting as I hoped they would be. They are a tiny bit baggy in some areas, but I have had a hard time finding good maternity jeans and these will be just great. I am 5'7", about 200 lbs, and I have started wearing these pants at 20 weeks pregnant. I imagine they will fit me snug by the end of my pregnancy. They are great pants, would definitely but them in different colors if they were available.
customer_reviews.author: pattie earl

customer_reviews.title: fit in front from denim to belly band is ridiculously baggy
customer_reviews.text: The area where the jeans transition in the front from denim to belly band is ridiculously baggy. There is so much extra material I can't see ever wearing these comfortably or without being extremely self-conscious. Very dissatisfied, especially after reading others' reviews. The legs fit fine, so it is hard to believe that the waist area would be so out of proportion.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pannepacker

customer_reviews.title: You NEED these JEANS
customer_reviews.text: These are the best maternity pants that I own!!! I was shocked by the quality of these jeans, the material is thick and comfortable. The fit is perfect with plenty of room for my growing baby bump. I have bought many pairs of maternity pants and these are by far my favorite. I highly recommended them to any expecting mom looking for a great pair of pants!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bea

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, but not a skinny jean
customer_reviews.text: These jeans are nicely made, but they definitely aren't "skinny." They fit more like a bootcut and are quite wide from the knee down. I was disappointed in the fit, because they weren't as described.
customer_reviews.author: PAMama

customer_reviews.title: Size Medium Fit Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Pre-pregnancy I wore size 6/8 jeans and decided to order the size Medium. I am currently 14 weeks pregnant and am 5'6" and these fit very well. The length on me is very similar to the display photo. I really love the color of the wash and the softness of the nude panel. I will definitely be ordering a second pair because of the quality and comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Too bad they fit so poorly.....
customer_reviews.text: Great fabric, nice style, but it was very loose around the front where the panel meets the jeans leaving me with a saggy, poochy look. Not a good maternity look. Didn't like it and returned them. Also, while they're not as wide as straight leg jeans, these are certainly not true skinny jeans around the ankle. Maybe it's just the way they fit my body.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. V

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these pants- they are super comfortable and stretchy, and the belly band is perfect. I wish they had them in a "short" size because I am probably going to have to get these hemmed, but otherwise, they look and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Nice material, but tight on belly
customer_reviews.text: Material was great, length is perfect, but the belly band wasn't very stretchy. It is thicker and much more compressing than my other maternity bottoms. Sadly I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Hay

customer_reviews.title: Tall girl loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'11 and 165 before pregnancy. Now I'm about 185 at 29 weeks. I was concerned that they wouldn't be long enough. But they worked great. Nice quality too. Definitely worth giving these a try. I love them and they are my new favorite maternity jeans!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable/looks like normal pants
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves these pants through pregnancy and even after for the healing process. She kept using them after she was fine healing and when I asked why she said they were very comfortable. They look good didn't fade and can be used even when not pregnant. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfy jeans!
customer_reviews.text: These jeans are AWESOME! I'm 6'1, and plus sized. I got an XL and they fit so well and are so comfy. I bought some from Target for a lot more money and I don't like them nearly as much as I like these. They're going to be a staple item throughout my pregnancy for sure! And I'm sure I'll wears them postpartum as well, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love them! So comfortable, well made, and still fashionable!
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: I loved these pants and loved the price
customer_reviews.text: I loved these pants and loved the price. I was going to get me another pair and they went from being $10 to $50 in two weeks. Give me a break! I was so disappointed. I wasn't going to pay that much for a pair of pants that I was only going to wear for 2 to 3 more months.
customer_reviews.author: Jenee Bailey

customer_reviews.title: AMAZINGGGG
customer_reviews.text: They are really nice looking and very comfy. Great quality. I’ve used since 5 months and I’m now 7 and they still fit. I got a small. Im 5’3 and 159 pounds / size 4-8 at 7 months / 28 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Jolyn M. Lorenzetti

customer_reviews.title: which is not great since the belly band is nude colored
customer_reviews.text: This are a little big and they tend to slip down on me, which is not great since the belly band is nude colored. It looks like my belly is showing. These jeans are weighty and look pretty good. Best suited for cooler weather.
customer_reviews.author: OllieP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect length!
customer_reviews.text: I tried SO many pairs of maternity jeans. I am 5’11” and usually have to buy size 18/20 tall. It has been really hard to find maternity jeans in that size that are long enough. But these are perfect length and the maternity band is extremely comfortable. So grateful to find this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Dirks

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these during second trimester, they were a little bunchy around the thighs but now that I'm in my third trimester, they fit great. I'm short 5'1" so I have to fold them up, but I'm used to that. Plus what a steal for $10!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: WoW! Amazing fit, really good quality. I first was afraid that they’ll shrink after wash but they stayed the same. For this price they are SUPER! I got couple of maternity jeans from Motherhood for much higher price and they are not as well manifactured at all! These jeans are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: These maternity jeans are awesome. They feel like real, quality jeans and not cheap jeggings. The belly panel is thick and supportive. I’m due with a summer baby so I don’t really need many more pairs of maternity jeans, but if I did, I’d buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: bexallday

customer_reviews.title: just meh
customer_reviews.text: These jeans are ok. They're not terrible but they don't fit the body like normal skinny jeans would. I kept wrestling with returning or not just because they won't look good with dressy tops. The crotch area has a lot of extra fabric so it's not flattering. I think i can try and make them work with some shirts. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: luzelenia

customer_reviews.title: Great pants
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 5’ very petite and I got an extra small for her and they fit great. No more pulling up her pants all day. Still roomy enough in the Jean area, but not baggy. Bell part fits just right, and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love these sore them all the time during and after my pregnancy. Very cute and comfortable. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: billy rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I tried on 4 different pair of maternity jeans and these fit and look the best on me. They are stretchy yet conforms to my hip and butt perfectly with room to grow. I bought these when I was about 16 weeks and currently 28 and still fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Herrera

customer_reviews.title: ... of maternity pants and these so far are my favorite. My pre-pregnancy size pants were 6-8
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several brands and styles of maternity pants and these so far are my favorite. My pre-pregnancy size pants were 6-8. I ordered a size Medium and these fit perfectly. The band is soft and stays in place. The legs are very flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Meg B

customer_reviews.title: Great Jeans
customer_reviews.text: These jeans are great I'm 13 weeks pregnant, normally a size 10. 5'6 150 lbs. I ordered a medium and there is still some room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: ElizaOlivia

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, run big
customer_reviews.text: These were on sale for $10, so I grabbed them. I've got an ample bootie and usually wear a large in maternity skinny jeans. I should have sized down. These fit more like straight leg than skinny. Having said that, for the $ they are excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: graceTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Purchase these pants for my pregnant wife , and they fit her perfectly. She normally wears a regular size 10-12.... Over all the quality is good, it has elastic stretchy material. Husband approved.
customer_reviews.author: e. vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Price was fantastic. When wearing them and you sit down the ...
customer_reviews.text: Price was fantastic. When wearing them and you sit down the belly band rolls over. I constantly have to keep pulling them up. I’m 5’3 inches and the pants need to be rolled up about 3 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Husband & Wife

customer_reviews.title: I just don't love how they fit my body
customer_reviews.text: Well made jeans, I just don't love how they fit my body. They are loose around my calves (and I have pretty thick calves). I read reviews that say they run a bit small so I ordered a size up and I wish I hadn't.
customer_reviews.author: masonsmomma13

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Strange cut and the area around where the Jean connects to the belly panel bunches up in a weird way no matter how much you tug at it. 3 stars because they were inexpensive, comfortable, and have functional pockets.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Macduff

customer_reviews.title: For 10 dollars it's great! If I paid more I would expect a ...
customer_reviews.text: For 10 dollars it's great! If I paid more I would expect a better fit. Little long for me, gets loser as you wear it, little saggy in the crouch. Not sure if it will fit me throughout pregnancy but right now it's great. And since I'm going to be prego in summer im not sure I would want to wear them during summer months. I'm 5'4 ft 180 lbs 20 weeks. The large fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H

customer_reviews.title: Not for a growing belly
customer_reviews.text: These look beautiful and the jeans fit great but the band is super tight. I was only 4 months pregnant when I tried these jeans on and the belly band was super tight and uncomfortable. Item returned.
customer_reviews.author: Renata Leyderman

customer_reviews.title: Reviews indicate it is good for curvy girls - buyer beware this is not ...
customer_reviews.text: Item was not anywhere near what is pictured, it says denim - these were not denim at all, they were essentially cotton leggings. I received a Large, I ordered a XXL. Reviews indicate it is good for curvy girls - buyer beware this is not anything close to what I got.Included a pen in the photo to show how small the supposedly XXL was.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Jordahl

customer_reviews.title: but overall they stay up pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Fit was a little big on me and the legs were really really long and I had to hem them. I wish the belly band was a little tighter, but overall they stay up pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: LT7

customer_reviews.title: Best jeans, true fit
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love, this brand. I've bought all the different styles and they are all so comfortable and the quality is excellent-better than store brands I've tried. I'm a size 12/14 and bought a large and they fit perfectly with room to spare. These are a must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Stone

customer_reviews.title: SO SO SO comfortable. I wear them almost exclusively now
customer_reviews.text: SO SO SO comfortable. I wear them almost exclusively now. The only thing I don't love is that the bottom seam is very visible through your clothes at times, and it does travel down throughout the day but I love them.
customer_reviews.author: ChaiChaiTrain

customer_reviews.title: Great maternity jeans!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! So comfortable. I’ve been having trouble finding maternity pants that stay up and don’t constantly slide down. These stay up great! The material on the belly band is stretchy, but still supportive. I’m 6 ft and these are a great length for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Todd

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t order again
customer_reviews.text: I’m not found of how they fit. But i love that they are light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not look like the photo
customer_reviews.text: Did not look like the photo. Mine were much larger than I expected. Ended up not wearing these at all.
customer_reviews.author: P.L.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Cheap reasonably decent maternity pants. However, they don't stay up and fit fairly loose. I use them as back ups. Don't recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah R.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to size down!
customer_reviews.text: Run very large and the thickness makes them not as dressy looking as I had hoped. They kind of bunch up, especially at the knees. The denim is however very soft. Just not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: yogagirl13

customer_reviews.title: Cute jeans, just didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: They're really cute and comfortable. I am petite--- 5'2'', 105 pre pregnancy and the small was a little too big for my legs so I returned.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: They have real pockets!
customer_reviews.text: I thought these fit great and are super comfortable! I'm norally an XS so I had a hard time finding pants especially for when I first started showing since most options only go down to small. Bonus: the front pockets are actually real/full size which I haven't found in any other pants!
customer_reviews.author: K. Young

customer_reviews.title: To frumpy
customer_reviews.text: Too stretchy. Hve to constantly tuck n pull up over my belly. Too slouchy
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie I.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance in ordering these jeans even though they only had XS. I am 5’10”, currently 150lbs and 21 weeks pregnant. Normally I wear a size 4 jeans so I was worried about ordering this size. Not only do they fit perfectly, they are a nice quality for the price andddd they are long enough for me!! Definitely happy with this purchase and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B

customer_reviews.title: Baggy for skinny jeans
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit me well. The cut made them baggy for skinny jeans. I had high hopes that these would be an affordable option, but returned them and purchased designer maternity jeans on sale.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie jane

customer_reviews.title: So in love with these jeans
customer_reviews.text: So in love with these jeans! I wish I had bought a couple of pairs when the price was $10.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looked fine but the stomach area was a bit bulky/not smooth ...
customer_reviews.text: Looked fine but the stomach area was a bit bulky/not smooth like on a picture. If you live in jeans... this might be ok for you though
customer_reviews.author: nadias

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of comfy jeans!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2, in my second trimester (24 weeks) and I weight about 128 lbs and these pants were a perfect fit for me! I ordered the extra small and they fit like a champ. They were a little long but I rolled the bottoms and they looked adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P

customer_reviews.title: These jeans are very comfortable and soft
customer_reviews.text: These jeans are very comfortable and soft. My only complaint is that the seam is very visible through my shirts. I like showing off my 7mth baby bump and it really sticks out! Other than that, these are the perfect maternity jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand! I was a size 8/10 pregnancy, so I ordered a large. Fit as expected. Fabric stretches throughout the day. Nude belly band (which is thicker than most maternity jeans) allows you to wear light colored shirts. Very comfy! Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: LuLu495

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit! I'm 5'8" and about 143lbs in my 5th month and the small fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: XS was perfect! Glad I followed the other reviews
customer_reviews.text: Order down- they definitely stretch! I am 5’4” 130 lbs. XS was perfect! Glad I followed the other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: barbarag

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Elastic band on top is to uncomfortable and tick it puts lots of pressure on my belly and I am only 26 weeks pregnant. Unfortunately I missed deadlines for return. Do not buy it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and the xsmall fits great! These even have pockets in the front and ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a 2/4 pre pregnancy, and the xsmall fits great! These even have pockets in the front and back! The belt band could be a little longer (not sure if they will make it to the 3rd trimester). For$10 great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Great pants
customer_reviews.text: The belly band is a bit loose. I'm in the 2nd trimester at 175lbs. Great fit overall.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna

customer_reviews.title: Too long for 5'5"
customer_reviews.text: These were comfortable and fit great, but they were way too long so I had to return them. For reference I am 5'5."
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: They fit great and are stylish
customer_reviews.text: Highly Reccommend! They fit great and are stylish. So comfortable! I bought a medium and wore a 6-8 pre-pregnancy. I'm 21 weeks now and they still fit great. A must maternity buy
customer_reviews.author: KRISTEN W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE these pants. I am 5'10'' and they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Killion

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: they were a gift and she loved them! they arrived promply and fit as expected
customer_reviews.author: L. Mahan

customer_reviews.title: Feeling comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This jeans is comfortable . I tried it on and I felt comfortable with my body . It’s a little on the long side but not too bad . If you on a budget, I would get them !
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I wear 8-10s and I'm only 3 months pregnant and ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear 8-10s and I'm only 3 months pregnant and the large in these is too tight. I'm not plus size, and these jeans make me disheartened for mamas-to-be that might be bigger than me. FASHION. GET. WOKE.
customer_reviews.author: Tempranillo13

customer_reviews.title: These are the perfect maternity jeans!
customer_reviews.text: These pants do not slide down and they fit so well. During pregnancy, I feel frumpy a lot but not with these jean's. Perfect to dress up or down. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: j. bartsch

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise very comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: A bit long in the legs, but otherwise very comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Nerida

customer_reviews.title: The best ones I’ve found
customer_reviews.text: These are the best ones I’ve found so far. I’ve tried some from target, old navy, off brands, and I have found these to be the best ones so far. I’m really excited to wear these
customer_reviews.author: Melania

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits great! Great quality as well. I think it’s a really good deal for that price
customer_reviews.author: Yekaterina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect staple
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable. So far my favorite jeans. Look great and most importantly stay up!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Its so hard to find maternity pants! These pants fit as expected, stretchy, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: April Torzala

customer_reviews.title: New favorite maternity jeans
customer_reviews.text: These are my new go-to maternity wear. I'm 5'7" and they're a shade long for me so I roll the cuffs, but they're cute with some stretch and the band stays up over my tum.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Ison

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Very nice as they have a bit bigger and stretchier top for your bump. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: cjmbookworm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were the perfect size and exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn R. Guarino

customer_reviews.title: Best pregnancy pants.
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it. Her favorite preg pants. Very comfortable and decent looking.
customer_reviews.author: O. M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these jeans. Very comfortable. They fit and look great. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about buying these 'skinny' jeans because I'm anything but skinny. I'm curvy/athletic 5 feet 7 inches, 155 lbs pre pregnancy and have a big butt. I was pleasantly surprised when I tried these on and they fit like a glove, I ordered a M. I'm currently 19 weeks and these are pretty much the only jeans I wear because the regular ones are just too tight and uncomfortable. The only tiny thing I would change is the hem which is a bit too short for me, but not so short that will look weird so I decided to keep them. Definitely cheaper than some of the other maternity brands out there.
customer_reviews.author: HPVtrigirl

customer_reviews.title: the material is comfortable, adequate elasticity to not cause discomfort when sitting ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'9, pre-pregnancy size 4-6 long for pants. The Medium was long enough for me, a little bit wider at the hips, but I'm sure I will grow into it in no time. Otherwise, the material is comfortable, adequate elasticity to not cause discomfort when sitting down. I've worn them religiously for a week, the belly band maintained good support after continuous use, and no sagging noted yet around the knees and thighs. No significant color bleeding noted when washed inside out. They make me feel like a normal woman again!
customer_reviews.author: vee.em

customer_reviews.title: Comfy jeans!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy. The waistline where the nude color band starts a bit low though, so need to wear longer top to ensure it is covered
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: They ripped
customer_reviews.text: They were kind of small and the seem ripped after I wash them I only got to wear them one time
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Keyes

customer_reviews.title: but generally good quality and much more supportive than most maternity pants
customer_reviews.text: It's really long, but generally good quality and much more supportive than most maternity pants.
customer_reviews.author: meghan

customer_reviews.title: Need to be a little "skinnier"
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because the legs weren't "skinny" enough for my liking. Color and wash was good though, I liked how dark they were.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Gaertner

product_meta.title: Three Seasons Maternity Women's Maternity Skinny Jean with Neutral Belly Band
product_meta.description: Faded and whiskered, this maternity skinny jean features a soft belly band for a smooth, comfortable fit.
feature_bullets: Skinny maternity jean featuring contrast stitching, whiskering at hips, and nude-tone belly band
